quote.nm: Shenzhen Edge Medical Co., Ltd. - B - H Shares
quote.summary: Shenzhen Edge Medical Co Ltd is a China-based company primarily engaged in designing, developing and manufacturing surgical robots. The Companyâ€™s products primarily include Edge Multi-Port Endoscopic Surgical Robot, Edge Single-Port Endoscopic Surgical Robot and Edge Bronchoscope Robot. The Edge Multi-Port Endoscopic Surgical Robot is a robot-assisted device that is applied to perform minimally invasive surgery (MIS), using robotic, imaging and digital technologies, covering applications in urologic, gynecologic, general and thoracic surgery. The Edge Single-Port Endoscopic Surgical Robot is a robot-assisted device that is applied to perform MIS through a single small incision or natural orifice, covering applications in urologic, gynecologic and general surgery. The Company conducts its business in the domestic market and overseas markets.
